OAUTH_IDENTITY_ALREADY_EXISTED: This account is already linked to another user
OAUTH_UNKNOWN_IDENTITY: No linked account found. Please log in to an existing account to link it first
OAUTH_DENIED_AUTHORIZATION: User cancelled or denied the authorisation request
OAUTH_UNBIND_FAILED: Failed to unlink account, please try again later
OAUTH_ONLY_ONE_IDENTITY_EXIST: Cannot unlink the last identity when SSO Only is enabled
